query.name: OrderQueryService.get
query.script: SELECT id, vn, amount, buyerId, buyerName, confirmedRemark, createdTime, deliveriedRemark, deliveryInfo, lastModifiedTime, number, payedRemark, paymentInfo, remark, sellerId, sellerName, status FROM t_order WHERE 1<>1 <#if id??> OR t.id = ${SP(id)} </#if>

query.name: OrderQueryService.select
query.script: SELECT id, vn, amount, buyerId, buyerName, confirmedRemark, createdTime, deliveriedRemark, deliveryInfo, lastModifiedTime, number, payedRemark, paymentInfo, remark, sellerId, sellerName, status FROM t_order WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> AND id = ${SP(id)} </#if> <#if sellerId??> AND sellerId = ${SP(sellerId)} </#if> <#if buyerId??> AND buyerId = ${SP(buyerId)} </#if> <#if status??> AND status = ${SP(status)} </#if>

query.name: OrderQueryService.getItems
query.script: SELECT id, commodityId, commodityName, commodityNumber, commodityPrice, qty, remark, orderId FROM t_order_items WHERE 1<>1 <#if orderId??> OR orderId IN (${SP(orderId)}) </#if>
